caption.p: Percentage of forest area affected by risk and its rate of change with temperature in China under RCP8.5. ( a) Fitted percentage of forest area subject to climate change risk (%) for each model (dashed lines) and the multi-model mean (black solid line). ( b) Rate of change in the risk area (% °C −1) as a function of the temperature anomaly relative to 1981–2010 for each model (dashed lines) and the multi-model mean (black solid line). Before quadratic curve fitting, data were smoothed using a 10-year running mean.
